headline.main: For Sparrows, Terror Has Grim Consequences

docs.abstract: Mother birds that were exposed to predator sounds had 40 percent fewer offspring than birds that were not exposed to predator noises, researchers found.
docs.snippet: Mother birds that were exposed to predator sounds had 40 percent fewer offspring than birds that were not exposed to predator noises, researchers found.

docs.lead_paragraph: Fear makes the wolf look bigger, or so goes a German proverb. And new research underlines the scientific basis for the adage: the mere hint of the presence of a predator can have life-or-death consequences for the terrorized prey, regardless of the true threat.

headline.main: For Sparrows, Terror Has Grim Consequences

docs.abstract: Mother birds that were exposed to predator sounds had 40 percent fewer offspring than birds that were not exposed to predator noises, researchers found.
docs.snippet: Mother birds that were exposed to predator sounds had 40 percent fewer offspring than birds that were not exposed to predator noises, researchers found.

docs.abstract: When Kathleen Sebelius overruled the F.D.A. on Plan B, she put politics over science. Now 14 Senators are demanding that she justify her decision.
docs.snippet: When Kathleen Sebelius overruled the F.D.A. on Plan B, she put politics over science. Now 14 Senators are demanding that she justify her decision.

docs.lead_paragraph: Here's a scene you may find familiar: Government experts carefully study a problem, and come to a conclusion based on scientific evidence. They get over-ruled by bureaucrats who seem more concerned about politics than science. This isn't a historical anecdote from the Bush administration. I'm talking about the Obama administration.
docs.abstract: When Kathleen Sebelius overruled the F.D.A. on Plan B, she put politics over science. Now 14 Senators are demanding that she justify her decision.
docs.snippet: When Kathleen Sebelius overruled the F.D.A. on Plan B, she put politics over science. Now 14 Senators are demanding that she justify her decision.

docs.lead_paragraph: Nearly every woman I know can recall one or more instances in which she was sexually assaulted, harassed, threatened, inappropriately touched or even raped.
docs.abstract: Jane E Brody Personal Health column asserts that today, despite improvements in early sex education and widespread publicity about sexual assaults, the overwhelming majority of both federal and misdemeanor cases never come to public or legal attention; notes that 15 of 16 rapists will never spend time in jail.
docs.snippet: Nearly every woman I know can recall one or more instances in which she was sexually assaulted, harassed, threatened, inappropriately touched or even raped.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said Monday that the Obama administration was wrong not to legalize over-the-counter sales of an after-sex contraception to girls under 17. Mr. Bloomberg, who has taken a strong interest in public health and prides himself on deferring to guidance from scientists, addressed the issue of the medication in Queens, just before joining Kathleen Sebelius, the Health and Human Services secretary, at a discussion of jobs in the health care field.

headline.main: After-Sex Pill: Mayor Faults Obama Move

docs.abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg criticizes Obama administration for not legalizing over-the-counter sales of Plan B after-sex contraception pill to girls under 17. (M)
docs.snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said Monday that  the Obama administration was wrong not to  legalize over-the-counter sales of an after-sex contraception  to girls under 17.     Mr. Bloomberg, who has taken a strong interest in public health and prides...

headline.print_headline: After-Sex Pill: Mayor Faults Obama Move

docs.abstract: The mayor said the Obama administration should have legalized over-the-counter sales of the contraceptive pill known as Plan B One-Step to girls under 17.
docs.snippet: The mayor said the Obama administration should have legalized over-the-counter sales of the contraceptive pill known as Plan B One-Step to girls under 17.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican leaders refused to vote on an amendment that would give military women coverage for abortion in cases of rape and incest.

headline.seo: An Injustice for Women in Uniform
headline.main: An Injustice for Women in Uniform
headline.print_headline: An Injustice for Women in Uniform

docs.abstract: Editorial scores Senate Republicans for blocking consideration of an amendment to the National Defense Authorization Act that would have lifted the statute denying female service members coverage for abortion care in cases of rape and incest; says amendment would have merely brought coverage for service members in line with other government employees.
docs.snippet: Republican leaders refused to vote on an amendment that would give military women coverage for abortion in cases of rape and incest.

docs.lead_paragraph: A growing number of sitcoms — “Parks and Recreation,” “How I Met Your Mother” — seem to be written with an Internet afterlife in mind.

headline.seo: ‘Parks and Recreation’ and Other Sitcoms’ Hashtags and Memes
headline.main: So Long, Water Cooler; Hello, Hashtag
headline.print_headline: So Long, Water Cooler; Hello, Hashtag

docs.abstract: Growing number of television sitcoms seem to be written with an Internet afterlife in mind, using social media and other Internet sources to further story lines and develop characters.
docs.snippet: A growing number of sitcoms — “Parks and Recreation,” “How I Met Your Mother” — seem to be written with an Internet afterlife in mind.
